interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: AIUMMO Nail Art Brush, 5 PCS Nail Art Design Pen Painting Tools set with Nail Liner Brush Nail Extension UV Gel Nail Builder Brush for Salon at Home DIY Nail Manicure Review Date: 2021/10/08 Store: AIUMMO Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Color': 'Pink, Copper', 'Brand': 'AIUMMO', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '7.91 x 2.68 x 0.55 inches; 1.45 Ounces'} Review Text: I received one "AIUMMO Nail Art Brush Set". This set includes 5 brushes.

The set comes in a cheap plastic pouch but the brushes are actually pretty nice.

They have a Pink / Purple color design, are easy to hold & use. The bristles don't fall out when you are using them either.

The two brushes that have the least amount of bristles are my favorites. They are like ultra fine & are great for painting designs like stripes, lines & even little dots on your fingernails.

The only downside to these brushes was after about 3 uses the bristles all curved to one side, like a C shape. That kind of sucked.

The other 3 brushes with more bristles are still in good, like new shape. Review Title: Not A Bad Set Of Brushes 💅 Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Mountain Falls Advanced Formula Nail Polish Remover Pads with 96% Acetone, for Natural Nails, 10 Count Mountain Falls {'Brand': 'Mountain Falls', 'Item Form': 'Pad', 'Item Weight': '0.01 Pounds', 'Unit Count': '10 Count'} These nail polish remover pads come individually wrapped & there are 10 in the box.

They smell just like normal, traditional nail polish remover & we all know what that smells like. Strong!!! As soon as I tore open the packet ... bam. That smell hit me.

The actual pads come out of the packet folded in half, have a pinkish color & they seem to be made out of felt or a felt like fabric.

I decided to use one to take off my bright Red toenail polish. The first 2 nails came clean but then I started to notice that the remover pad was smearing the polish all over my toes & leaving finger nail polish color on my fingers.

Overall, the pads do work but you're probably going to have to use at least 2 at a time. That means only 5 nail polish removals per box & for the price listed, I find them highly overpriced.

Excuse my swollen foot picture, I'm trying to show how using just 1 nail polish remover pad left my toenail/toe area with a pinkish red hue. Just Okay 💅 Bouquet Garni Body Shower White Musk - Unique Fragrance Decanting Engineering Method gives Long Lasting Rich Fragrance - Gentle and Mild Cleansing Scented Body Wash with Natural Surfactant 17.85 Fl Oz Bouquet Garni {'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Skin Type': 'All, Dry', 'Brand': 'Bouquet Garni', 'Scent': 'Garni', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '8.23 x 6.34 x 3.66 inches; 1.34 Pounds'} I was so excited to try this "Bouquet Garni Body / Shower Wash".

The presentation is so nice & makes the product seem so high end.

The body wash arrives in its own logo cardboard box. Suitable for gift giving.

The bottle itself is a pump bottle, with a beautiful label and Silver colored accent on the pump. It really is pretty.

The actual body wash is Clear in color & smells like Vanilla overall with a tiny hint of a musky smell.

I found that the body wash does lather up really well and does leave the skin nicely scented.

The problem I had was it also caused some skin irritation. Causing my skin to turn red and blotchy. I have extremely sensitive skin anyway so this is a personal issue specific to me, my skin.

Others could use this body wash and be just fine.

I tried to check the ingredients list on the bottle and it is written in what looks like Korean or Chinese.

I went back and checked the website, the few ingredients I found listed are Sodium Chloride, Citric Acids & Lavender Extract. Smells Good But Caused Irritation 🙁 Beard Brush, Comb, Scissors Grooming Kit for Men's Care, Perfect to Distribute Balm or Oil for Growth & Styling, Adds Shine & Softness Black Color GROW ALPHA BEARD {'Package Dimensions': '7.4 x 3.4 x 2.3 inches; 7.2 Ounces', 'UPC': '300875400470 719279662702'} This three piece set arrives in a Black logo box. The set includes a brush, a comb and a pair of scissors.

The brush fits nicely in your hand with a sort of contoured wooden handle. The bristles are somewhat firm but at the same time have some give to them.

The comb is made of what I assume is plastic. It has 2 different size teeth.

The scissors are made of stainless steel. A decent size for clipping stray hairs around your mustache / nose area.

My boyfriend used the scissors to clean up his mustache. You could also use them to clip any stray nose hairs. He really loved the brush and carries it around with him to brush his hair (the hair on his head since he doesn't have a beard). Boyfriend Recommended 👨 Germ Shark PX50 Travel Wipes - Travel Sanitizing Wipes - 4 Paks of 50 each (200 Wipes) in Resealable Foil Travel Wipes Case Germ Shark {'Brand': 'Germ Shark', 'Unit Count': '200.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '4', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Item Form': 'Wipe', 'Package Dimensions': '10.16 x 10.12 x 4.65 inches; 3.59 Pounds', 'UPC': '375158000142'} I received 4 packs of "Germ Shark PX50 70% Isopropyl Alcohol Wipes". They are about the size of most baby wipes & arrive in packs like that as well. Fifty wipes per pack.

The wipes themselves are really well made. There are White in color, smell like Alcohol (obviously) and are very durable. There is no lint / small pieces of fiber from the wipes left behind as I wiped my hands, phone screen, etcetera.

The quality is excellent. They have the perfect amount of alcohol on each wipe to get the job done but not so much that excess liquid is dripping everywhere.

My only problem with these alcohol wipes is the price. Despite the convenience & quality I can honestly say I would not purchase them "again" at the listed price. Quality & Convenience 📌 Bath Body Brush with Super Comfy Bristles for Universal Skin,Long Bamboo Handle Gentle Exfoliation Improve Skin's Health and Beauty Wet or Dry Brushing Back Scrubber for Shower Zhaoyun ['Bath Body Exfoliating Brush,Shower Back Cleaning Scrubber with Long Handle,Dry or Wet Skin Exfoliator Brush with Soft Bristles Back Washer', 'Perfect for Daily Hygiene and Sensitive Skin.', 'Soft Nylon Bristles Be Easier to produce abundant foam,Just add some gel on it and rub the bristles.', 'This Brush will help you a better bath experience, Feel Fresh and Renewed Every Day.', 'Long Reach Handle', 'The Extended 16 inches Long Handle Will Use More Friendly.', 'Note：this brush bristles is too soft so if you want to exfoliate, we recommend using it with a body scrub.'] {'Product Dimensions': '17 x 4 x 2 inches; 7.55 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Zhaoyun'} The "Bath Body Brush With Super Comfy Bristles" is a nice addition to any shower / bathtime routine.

It has a very sturdy handle made of Bamboo. You can really apply pressure to scrub those hard to reach areas without any worries at all that the handle will break. Unlike my previous brush that had a plastic handle.

The bristles themselves are so soft. I loved them dry but as I wet them and applied some body wash the bristles weren't as great as I initially thought. They were almost too soft. I feel like they weren't doing as good of a job scrubbing the skin as some of my previous body brushes that had stiffer bristles did.

I would have preferred that the bristles be a little more stiffer. So, as I used the brush for soaping up my body I actually felt some type of friction against my skin. Very Well Made / Sturdy 💪 AIUMMO Nail Art Brush, 5 PCS Nail Art Design Pen Painting Tools set with Nail Liner Brush Nail Extension UV Gel Nail Builder Brush for Salon at Home DIY Nail Manicure AIUMMO {'Color': 'Pink, Copper', 'Brand': 'AIUMMO', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '7.91 x 2.68 x 0.55 inches; 1.45 Ounces'} I received one "AIUMMO Nail Art Brush Set". This set includes 5 brushes.

The set comes in a cheap plastic pouch but the brushes are actually pretty nice.

They have a Pink / Purple color design, are easy to hold & use. The bristles don't fall out when you are using them either.

The two brushes that have the least amount of bristles are my favorites. They are like ultra fine & are great for painting designs like stripes, lines & even little dots on your fingernails.

The only downside to these brushes was after about 3 uses the bristles all curved to one side, like a C shape. That kind of sucked.

The other 3 brushes with more bristles are still in good, like new shape. Not A Bad Set Of Brushes 💅
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Type Preference:** Continues to show strong interest in beauty and personal care products with a particular focus on nail care tools. Recent experiences suggest an openness to exploring new nail art accessories alongside established preferences for body washes and personal grooming items.

- **Performance Expectations:** Expects consistent quality and performance from all beauty tools. Acknowledges that while products can have aesthetic appeal, effectiveness and durability must not be compromised, particularly in tools used for intricate detailing.

- **Sensory Sensitivity:** Maintains sensitivity to scents and skin irritation, which continues to guide careful selection of products. The user appreciates tools that allow for creative expression without exacerbating sensitivity concerns.

- **Value Consciousness:** Values cost-effectiveness and performance. Recent evaluations indicate satisfaction when products deliver effective results that match their price, although there is some disappointment when functionality declines with use.

- **Usage Experience:** Prefers user-friendly products that facilitate an enjoyable and efficient grooming experience without complications. Recent interactions demonstrate a positive response to tools that enhance creativity, with an emphasis on usability.

- **Presentation Considerations:** Appreciates well-designed products that combine functionality with aesthetic appeal. The user favors durable materials and tools that are comfortable to hold, which enhance their overall grooming routine.

Overall, the user embodies a practical approach to beauty, prioritizing effectiveness, sensory comfort, and an enjoyable experience while expressing a willingness to experiment with new enhancements to their nail care toolkit.
